amendment.description: Amendment increases and reduces necessary expenses for the Office of the Secretary of Agriculture by $136,070,000 and is intended to restore full funding for the for the President's request to the Community Futures Trading Commission (CFTC).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase and reduce necessary expenses for the Office of the Secretary of Agriculture by $136,070,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
